StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetProgramDescrip.ons]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProgramType varchar(4) AS
SELECT PROGRAM_ID, PROGRAM_CODE + ' - ' + PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION AS PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION FROM PROGRAM WHERE PROGRAM_TYPE = @ProgramType AND STATUS = 'A' ORDER BY PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION
